itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the repercussions of the PAC-12's list of demands for it's college athletes, why the ratings are awful for the restart of the NBA and MLB, why the NHL is flourishing, and Ross picks the winner of the first PGA Major this weekend.
